title: Federal Court Decision on XRP Sets a New Course for Ripple
description: In a groundbreaking federal court ruling, Ripple Labs, the digital payments company, received a significant victory as a judge declared that its cryptocurrency token, XRP, is not a security. This decision brings newfound freedom for Ripple to explore various business opportunities without the constraints imposed by securities regulations. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse expressed his relief, ... Read more
